title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers. Same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama. ChatGPT-like UI, model management, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Simple interface to chat, generate, list, pull, delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper built with Node.js. Adds conversation history, markdown rendering, syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement. Inline suggestions & chat.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI for Ollama. Run locally with one command, supports markdown & code blocks.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset. Use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama. Supports .NET 6+, async streaming, embeddings, vision.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate. Strongly typed, async/tokio, streaming chat & generate, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library. Idiomatic Go API with context support, streaming, and full model management.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, NVIDIA runtime, and GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes. Supports GPU nodes, persistent storage, and custom images.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-chat UI that can connect to local Ollama instances via OpenAI-compatible proxy mode.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server. Slash commands, streaming replies, role-based access.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI assistance. Summarize notes, generate text, Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines. Spin up GPU containers, run prompts, capture outputs.
